pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena rājā pasenadi kosalo senāya abbhuyyāto hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:1.3: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya agamaṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:1.4: Addasā kho rājā pasenadi kosalo chabbaggiye bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:1.11: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya āgacchissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:1.12: Amhākampi alābhā, amhākampi dulladdhaṃ, ye mayaṃ ājīvassa hetu puttadārassa kāraṇā senāya āgacchāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:1.13: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:1.14: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:1.15: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gacchissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:1.16: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gacchathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:1.19: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gacchissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:1.21: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:1.22: “Yo pana bhikkhu uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gaccheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:1.23: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno mātulo senāya gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:2.2: So tassa bhikkhuno santike dūtaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:2.6: Atha kho tassa bhikkhuno etadahosi—“bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ—‘na uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gantabban’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:2.10: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:2.12: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:2.13: “Yo pana bhikkhu uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gaccheyya, aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:3.1.6: senā gāmato nikkhamitvā niviṭṭhā vā hoti payātā vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:3.1.9: Dvādasapuriso hatthī, tipuriso asso, catupuriso ratho, cattāro purisā sarahatthā patti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:3.1.12: Dassanūpacāraṃ vijahitvā punappunaṃ passati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:3.2.1: Uyyutte uyyuttasaññī dassanāya gacchati, aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:3.2.2: Uyyutte vematiko dassanāya gacchati, aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:3.2.3: Uyyutte anuyyuttasaññī dassanāya gacchati, aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:3.2.6: Dassanūpacāraṃ vijahitvā punappunaṃ passati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc48:3.3.3: bhikkhussa ṭhitokāsaṃ vā nisinnokāsaṃ vā nipannokāsaṃ vā āgacchati,
